title: 3 Seahawks and Patriots facts to know to sound smart at your Super Bowl party

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: 3 Seahawks and Patriots facts to know to sound smart at your Super Bowl party
sources.description: Not everyone has been watching the NFL all season long, especially when it comes to a Super Bowl party. Unless you’re deeply invested in the Seahawks or Patriots it’s often just a chance to get together, have some food and drinks, watch the commercials, and be a part of a cultural moment. Even so, it’s […]
